channel.title: Forest of life on Chaotic Online
channel.description: Recent content in Forest of life on Chaotic Online

item.title: A Fearsome Fate
item.description: In the previous episodes, Tom finally got a new scan of his favorite Creature, Maxxor, but when he used it for the first time in battle he realizes that something is wrong.

item.title: A Gigantic Mission
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Vlar guiding Kiru and his fighters through the Temple of the ancient Gigantempopolis, when the giants were alive, in an attempt of dissuading Kaal to not invade Kiru City anymore, however, during the trip, the own future of the OverWorld was traced

item.title: A Peytonic Adventure
item.description: In this episode, an adventure in the 007 style in which Peyton is challenged by a world famous counterfeiter for a Chaotic match

item.title: A Rare Hazard
item.description: In the first episode of the Second Season, we will have a closure for events of the previous episode, with right to terrorism and espionage

item.title: Castle Bodhran or Bust (Part 1)
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet the story of Reginald Terrington, the problems in which he got himself and the friends’ group attempt to rescue him with a bet that could mean the end of the career in Chaotic of one of them.

item.title: Castle Bodhran or Bust (Part 2)
item.description: In the continuation of the previous episode, Tom comes face-to-face with his hero, but before he could even try to rescue Reggie, he must not only gain his trust but also fight a real battle against another Tribe along with his friends.

item.title: Fallen Hero
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a treacherous coup of Lord Van Bloot against Maxxor that could destroy the OverWorld.

item.title: Maze of Menace
item.description: In this episode, continuing the sequence in which the Commander of the Otherworld, Maxxor, was ambushed by Lord Van Bloot’s treacherous Mugic, we’ll see a partnership between Creatures and humans to restore the Fallen Hero before it’s too late.

item.title: Mega Match
item.description: In this episode we’ll see the internal competition between Kaz and Peyton to see who is the best Chaotic player get to a next level… only now it’s up to Tom

item.title: Scavenger Scan
item.description: In this episode we’ll see Kaz and Peyton competing with each other (again) to see who is the best player of Chaotic between them.

item.title: Shifting Sands
item.description: In this episode Peyton shows to Tom that not all of the Mipedians are cruel and pitiless as those he met while rescuing Reggie.

item.title: The Thing About Bodal
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Bodal, a Creature very talkative, annoying and cocky about himself. We’ll also see the most improbable of all fights in Chaotic.

item.title: Trading Cards
item.description: In this episode we’ll see a card trading chain engineered by Sarah so she could have the scan of rare Mugic. Of course our gentlemen wouldn’t let her down… right?

item.title: Worlds Apart
item.description: In this episode we’ll meet Jycella, Krystella’s twin sister, and we’ll see that the bad relationship between them, common among humans, also happens in Perim, with the twin sisters Aivenna and Nivenna
